question: Who has won the Asian Business Leadership Forum Global Asian Award-2019?
explanation: Kumar Mangalam Birla, chairman of the Aditya Birla Group was conferred the ABLF Global Asian Award for â€œpowerful individual whose business footprint and commitment to excellence have engaged international interest and attention\". The Asia Business Leadership Forum (ABLF) is backed by the UAE government, and currently runs in three forms- talks, awards, and publications.
